This is a support category for help on everything related to scripting on the Roblox platform, from extremely basic to even the most technical of issues.

Make sure to search the forum before creating a new topic, many beginner / learning resources have already been created, or maybe your problem has already been solved by someone else.

If you’re looking to show off your project and get opinions and feedback, please use Creations Feedback instead!

Please do not post bug reports or feature requests here! Always pick the right category for your topic!

How should I write my topic?

You can write your topic however you want, but you need to answer these questions:

  1. What do you want to achieve? Keep it simple and clear!

  2. What is the issue? Include screenshots / videos if possible!

  3. What solutions have you tried so far? Did you look for solutions on the Creator Hub?

After that, you should include more details if you have any. Try to make your topic as descriptive as possible, so that it’s easier for people to help you!

Please do not post screenshots of code. Instead, format blocks of code by wrapping it in triple backticks (`) like this:

```
-- Code
```

Please do not ask people to write entire scripts or design entire systems for you. If you can’t answer the three questions above, you should probably pick a different category.

Who can post here?

  • All members of the forum can create topics in this category and reply to topics.
  • Everyone can read all the contents in this category, even when not logged in.

Got an issue to post, but you’re not a forum member yet?

See this post for more information on how to contribute.
